content: why lock here welcome back thanks for joining me for a very special episode in
our whole crafting community is built on the foundations of feedback and new
ideas all that kind of thing and in case you're one who doesn't regularly peruse
the forums or DM Scotty's Facebook group here's a collection of awesome ideas of
things that people have done with stuff from my episode so enjoy and thank you
and lastly here's an interesting little bit guy named Ernie Mercer sent me this
gift of tiles and asked me to critique them of course as you can see I am
definitely not qualified to make that critique so I thought I would just show
them off to you these appear to be molded I don't know if they're Hirst
arts or what but they're real heavy they feel like stone I don't know anything
about casting so I don't know what they are exactly these poles are a little bit
sticky I'm kind of resin okay the bottom is masonite board I recognize that a
youth inch thick these are heavy these are solid love them looks like this is
sort of an under dark look purple and blue and it's their gridded one inch
squares I like that I like grids I like playing grid lists on grids so
this is particularly nice I've got differing elevations pretty cool stuff
today I'm gonna be doing more of these in the future so if you got work that
you've done based on stuff from my channel feel free to send me pictures
and I'll feature them so thanks Ernie I've got his contact info on the screen
here he is a true craftsman get in touch with him check out his stuff
I am why luck and I will see you guys next time for our grand season finale
